meanings.definition: The branch of physiology that deals with the functions of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neurophysiology helps us understand how our nerves work.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study neurophysiology to learn about the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: Learning about neurophysiology is like solving a puzzle about nerves.
meanings.sent4: In the intricate web of the body, neurophysiology is the master conductor.
meanings.sent5: The secrets of neurophysiology unlock the mysteries of our brain and nerves.

meanings.definition: The study of the functioning of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Understanding neurophysiology is crucial for medical research.
meanings.sent2: Neurophysiology explores how our nervous system operates.
meanings.sent3: A fun fact: neurophysiology is like detective work for the brain.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of our body, neurophysiology plays a vital role.
meanings.sent5: The complexities of neurophysiology reveal the wonders of our nervous system.
